name: Rumblefest '89
description:
NESmaker Byte-off 2020 submission  

Project status: Prototype 

Jurassic Sunset Games

Rumblefest is an action game for the NES. Set in the 80's, you play as Mason Hawk. A former prodigy with a troubled past. You'll fight against 80's inspired villains to reach your former glory!

__________________________________________________________

Please note this is an extremely early prototype and proof of concept.
